wikipedia_page.main:
David Emanuel (born 17 November 1952) is a Welsh fashion designer who is best known for designing, with his then-wife Elizabeth Emanuel, the wedding dress worn by Diana, Princess of Wales, in 1981.
He participated in the British reality television show I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! in 2013 and came runner-up to Westlife singer Kian Egan.
He is currently Host and Creative Director of the  TLC flagship show Say Yes to the Dress: UK.
He has also Hosted and Creatively Directed a spin off TLC show Say Yes to the VEGAS Dress. Which sees him in Las Vegas dealing with last minute brides and grooms.
